title: Firefox for Android 46.0.1 Release

notes.note:
Reference for [Firefox for Android 46.0][1] release notes


  [1]: https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/android/46.0/releasenotes/

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 2.3
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
